devdoc.details: This contract does not support BNB.

getPoolReserve(uint256).details: Get pool reserve by pool id.

params._accessControl: Address of the access control contract.
params._amountOutMin: Min amount out for the pancake swap.
params._minAmountToConvert: Asset should be worth of min amount to convert to BUSD
params._pancakeSwapRouter: Address of the pancake swap router.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._amountOutMin: Min amount out for the pancake swap.

params._pancakeSwapRouter: Address of the pancake swap router.

swapAllPoolsAssets().details: Swap assets of all pools into BUSD tokens.

swapPoolsAssets((uint256,string,address,.details: Swap assets of selected pools into BUSD tokens.

params.venusPools: Array of Pools to swap for BUSD

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.amount: Amount to be transferred to auction contract.
